lexUnit.name: treason.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the crime of betraying one's country, especially by attempting to kill or overthrow the sovereign or government.

sentence.text: The " barbecoup " , as it came to be known from the social event which preceded it , resulted in a charge of treason against Tohian two months later .
